I am looking to purchase the following T206 Southern League Players in a PSA 4.
If anyone can help me with this it would be greatly appreciated. I have been working on a PSA 4 SL set and have some extra Christmas Cash to spend so I thought that I would start here on Net 54. Please email me at [url]jocajen@hotmail.com[/url] 

PSA 4 or 4.5 Only.

Sid Smith             Ray Ryan
Carlos Smith         Woody Thornton

Happy Holidays!
John P
